name: Gangsters City Boxing
description:
Gangsters City Boxing!!!
Have fun playing this exciting street brawl kungfu champ: martial arts games offered by Knock Solutions. This ultimate fighting action combat: 3d fighting games is not only a free game but is also an offline game. Fun is locked in the install button.

Features:

• Mainly a classic action fighting game.
• Realistic kung fu training sounds.
• Various wildcat strikes and fighting styles
• Lifelike streets environment
• Pleasing intuitive controls.
• Offline fighting PVP game.
